abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Acid Bather: Acid damage rolls affect it as healing rolls.
Immutable: It can't be transformed.
Magic Ward I: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d4 penalty.
Unbaked: If it takes 5 or more Fire damage at once, it is Dazed (Cd4).
Statblocks // Artificials Statblocks // Artificials 119 119 Bestiary Golem, Flesh TL: 4.7 Large Artificial A living automoton of stitched-together flesh, given life through electric strikes.
HD: 9 (40 HP)  Speed: 20' Zone: Frontline Morale: 10  # Appearing:1 Senses: Darksight Armor: 0 [as Unarmored] Immune: Cold, Poison, Shock; Physical from non-Relics Weak: Fire Status Immunities: Charmed, Fatigued, Paralyzed, Sickened ACTIONS Multi-Attack: 2×Slam Slam [Melee Attack]: 9 (2d8 (+2 if this Being is Berserk)) ABILITIES Bloodied Rage: At 20 HP or less, it is Berserk.
Flame-Averse: If it can see fire or takes damage from fire, it is Frightened (Cd4).
Shock-Absorber: Shock damage rolls heal it instead.
